title: If We’re Going to Do It....!
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Hey, Rin. Haven’t you heard something about a stage lifted by helis from Nicocchi?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh? Rin hasn’t, but.... What do you mean by a stage lifted by helis?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, you see, Nicocchi told me that she wanted to use my helis to create a performance worthy of the number one idol in the universe. But if we’re going to do it, then we might as well make it as flashy as possible, right? So I asked Nicocchi, “How about using 4 helicopters to lift up a stage”. The helis are ready on my side, so I’ve been wanting to ask the condition over on your side<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eeeeeeh~~~!? We never heard of that nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>My, you guys never did? That’s a problem....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>But that sounds really really interesting! Rin wants to see beautiful sceneries from a high-up stage nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Right? It’s a great idea, no? Can you talk about it with other μ’s members, Rin?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yeah! Hey, Mari-san, can Rin ask for something too? If we’re going to do it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What is it~? I’ll grant anything you want, Rin♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin wants to parachute off the lifted stage nya---!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
